title: Fix the stuttering problem on high end pc's already!
body: Ever since I upgraded from gtx 750 to gtx 980ti about 4 months ago I've been suffering from severe fps drops and stuttering through out the game, I sought player support and no solution they suggested helped. All my hardware parts are far superior to this game, I can operate overwatch, battlefield, call of duty, gta 5, star wars batllefront, titanfall 2, just cause 3 on ultra settings without a single sweat. League is about the only game I suffer from when it comes to fps, I checked out the forum at the player support section 2 days ago and noticed that riot does acknowledge the fact that the game struggles to run on high end pc's, and the only solution suggested is turning off a feature in game settings or video settings I forgot, which was already disabled in my options anyway. The question is, when will the problem get fixed? I cannot endure playing league like this anymore. My brother's shitty pc runs the game better than I do. We're talking about 16 gb ram, gtx 980ti and intel core i7 with a water cooling system, gratefully, I never suffer from heating problems.. League doesn't even require a fraction of the performance my pc can produce and yet It's the only game that struggles to run on my pc. It's really pissing me off.

replies.body:
Hey there, since the steps in the guide didn't help I created a ticket for you.  While we can offer basic troubleshooting steps, our we'll want to dig deeper to get more info for your specific issue.  Our tech team can look into this with you directly and figure out some solutions.  Your ticket number is 32757460.

Whenever possible, attach some logs through the [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to give us more context.  They'll get back to you as soon as they can.
Thank you for replying, really appreciate the time you're willing to put into this. I'll send the logs to the player support through the email or here?
Hey there, you should be able to attach your logs to your ticket.  The boards doesn't have an attachment feature, and I wouldn't want to have your logs on a public venue anyway.  :D
